Description Box Template Format:
Clinic Name*
Your Name*
Official Email Address *
Phone Number*
Clinic Phone Number
COM*
Patient Name*
Patient Mobile Number*
Patient ID*
Patient Aadhaar/Pan Card Number
Attachment of documents -
1. Duly filled signed Claim form with signature of member (Please note there are different claim forms for CARE & Magma) Care is Membership 3.0 and Magma is Membership 2.0
2. Cancelled Cheque in the name of proposer/member – Member name should be printed on Cheque, Alternatively /bank passbook first page can be shared
3. Detailed Discharge Summary - Date & Time of admission and discharge, final diagnosis, past histor, treatment given etc should ideally be mentioned, If the same is not given in the discharge summary please arrange for the same from the clinic/hospital.
4. KYC details - Aadhar/PAN card
5. Hospicash policy document and policy number.
6. Treating doctor certificate for detailed case history with progression, duration and past history of the present ailment ( If required, this will be asked by Bima Team)
7. Final Hospital Bill (If required, this will be asked by Bima Team)
